Usain Bolt.description: Sprinting legend, 100m and 200m world record holder

Mo Farah.description: Multiple Olympic gold medalist in 5000m and 10000m

Allyson Felix.description: Most decorated female track athlete in Olympic history

Cheetah.description: Fastest land animal with a top speed of 70-75 mph

Horse.description: Domesticated mammal used for racing and transportation

Kangaroo.description: Marsupial that moves by hopping with extremely efficient energy return
